name: ANARCHISTROBOT Prototype
description:
WARNING: THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE, NOWHERE NEAR A FULL GAME. Have fun!

The only game where you can shoot rocks out of a AK-.. I mean.. Totally not an AK-47...

While covered in cheese.

In this game you play as a government robot stolen and  reprogrammed by an anarchist to destroy the pentagon and the government as a whole.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to look and shoot
